summary.title: Triple-Negative Breast Cancer (TNBC) Transcriptomics
summary.abstract: Whole transcriptome sequencing (RNA-Seq) of 500 TNBC core biopsies collected prior to neoadjuvant chemotherapy. Correlated with Pathological Complete Response (pCR) rates.

documentation.description: Whole transcriptome sequencing (RNA-Seq) of 500 TNBC core biopsies collected prior to neoadjuvant chemotherapy. Correlated with Pathological Complete Response (pCR) rates. This is a dummy description generated for testing purposes.

project.projectName: TNBC-TRANSCRIPT: Defining the Transcriptomic Architecture of Triple-Negative Breast Cancer
project.projectScope: Bulk and single-cell RNA sequencing data of Triple-Negative Breast Cancer tumors to characterize transcriptomic heterogeneity.
